pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, March 23, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will host the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden, and the First Lady of the United States of America, Dr. Jill Biden.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Media appearances:

6:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA’s Salut Bonjour.

7:05 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV’s Your Morning.
